import React from "react"; const Privacy = () => { return ( <>

**Privacy Policy for CourseClipper Platform: Your Trusted Course Review Website**

This Privacy Policy, in conjunction with our Terms of Use and any referenced documents herein, outlines the principles guiding the collection, utilization, disclosure, and processing of personal data ("CourseClipper") and its affiliates. Personal data may encompass but is not limited to your name, physical address, email address, phone number, age, preferred language, and any other pertinent information (collectively referred to as "Personal Information"). Our Privacy Policy is a declaration of our commitment to safeguarding Personal Information and respecting the privacy of individuals like yourself ("you"). By accessing the CourseClipper website, https://www..courseclipper.com (the "Site"), subscribing to receive email content from CourseClipper, and/or engaging with CourseClipper through email or any other means (collectively the "Service"), you consent to the usage of your information in compliance with this Privacy Policy (the "Policy").

**Information Collection**:

CourseClipper may request and collect Personal Information and other data at various points on the Site. The collected Personal Information is used to enhance the efficiency of CourseClipper's operations, promote our services and products, and manage the Site.

**Information from Site Usage**:

CourseClipper may gather standard internet log information regarding your usage of the Site. This data may include, but is not restricted to, your IP address, location data, weblogs, time and date of access, browser type and version, referring web addresses, other communication data, conducted searches, and visited pages.

**Information from Site Usage**:

CourseClipper may gather standard internet log information regarding your usage of the Site. This data may include, but is not restricted to, your IP address, location data, weblogs, time and date of access, browser type and version, referring web addresses, other communication data, conducted searches, and visited pages.

**Storage of Personal Information**:

Your Personal Information is securely stored on servers controlled by CourseClipper, either at our office or at the offices of our service providers.

**Email Communications**:

Periodically, CourseClipper may send marketing or promotional email communications to you, containing valuable information about our new products and services. During this process, we may collect certain information, including but not limited to the date and time of your initial email opening, the frequency of opening our email communications, and overall click-through activity on the content of our emails to compile general statistics.

**Opt-Out**:

If you wish to discontinue receiving further communications, please email admin@courseclipper.com to request removal. In compliance with applicable data protection laws, your Personal Information will not be deleted but will be added to a suppression list to honor your request. We do not sell, trade, or rent your Personal Information to third parties.

**Cookies, Similar Technologies, and IP Addresses**:

To optimize the user experience on our Site, we and our service providers may use cookies to collect standard information, including your language preferences, browser type and version, and related details. These cookies aim to enhance your Site experience. You have the option to configure your browser to notify you upon receiving a cookie or to reject cookies. However, rejecting cookies may limit your access to certain Site features.

**Service Providers**:

CourseClipper may engage third-party entities to manage various aspects of our business operations, including the processing or handling of Personal Information. We take suitable measures to ensure that your Personal Information is handled consistently with this Policy when utilizing external services.

**Social Media Widgets**:

Our Site may incorporate Social Media Features, such as the Facebook Like button and Widgets or interactive mini-programs. These Features may collect your IP address, visited page on our site, and may utilize cookies to function correctly. Social Media Features and Widgets are either hosted by third parties or directly on our Site, with interactions governed by the respective enterprise's privacy policy.

**Access to Personally Identifiable Information**:

You have the option to correct, update, or delete your personally identifiable information if it changes.

**Use and Disclosure of Personal Information**:

CourseClipper may collect and process Personal Information for various purposes, including but not limited to:

  • Presenting Site content effectively.
  • Providing and facilitating the Service.
  • Offering public answers to your inquiries.
  • Delivering support and managing requests and complaints.
  • Sending updates, notifications, announcements, and additional Service-related information.
  • Distributing marketing and advertising material through email, subject to your prior consent.
  • Conducting surveys and questionnaires.
  • Enforcing the Terms of Use between you and CourseClipper.
  • Communication as required by CourseClipper.
  • Preventing fraud, identity theft, and illegal activities.
  • Handling breakdowns and malfunctions.
  • Taking necessary actions in disputes or legal proceedings.
  • Protecting the rights and safety of our affiliates, third parties, and ourselves.
  • Transferring information in the event of a sale, merger, consolidation, or acquisition, with the acquirer subject to this Policy.
  • As permitted by law.

**Agreement to Policy Terms**:

Your use of this Site and/or provision of information to us signifies your acceptance and agreement to the collection and use of your Personal Information for the aforementioned purposes. We routinely review and may modify and update our policies.

**Governing Law**:

This Privacy Policy is governed by the laws of the UK education system, applicable regardless of your domicile, residency, or physical location. The Site and its Content are intended for lawful use only in jurisdictions where they may be offered for use.

**Changes**:

CourseClipper may make changes or revisions to this Policy from time to time. If significant changes are made regarding the use of User's Personal Information, these changes will be posted on this page.

**Contact Us**:

For any questions, concerns, or suggestions regarding this Policy, please contact us

); }; export default Privacy;
